title: Fashion MNIST
description: A 2D convolutional neural network to identify 10 different types of clothing. Inspiration for my personal app Zazz

title: Zazz
description: An IOS app that tells users if the color of an item of clothing is flattering. Created an algorithm that computes a score out of 100 based on an input image of the userâ€™s skin, and an image of an item of clothing. Utilized graphic design experience with different color models
